subject: [Radiance-general] How does Radiance handle glazing transmittance -dependent on the angle of incidence?
body:
Message-ID: <CAOs1TpZVRYv0AHzk+8fg4_8=QzW5yq99KmznXEHzLRfC91Qr4g@mail.gmail.com>

Dear all,

Does anyone know how Radiance calculates how much of an incoming light ray
is reflected and how much is transmitted dependent on the angle of
incidence?

Best,
Amalie
